00026 void _sharedPtrQDeleter(QObject *);
00027 
00028 template <class T>
00029 class qshared_ptr : public shared_ptr<T>
00030 {
00031 public:
00032     qshared_ptr() : shared_ptr<T>() {}
00033     template <class Y>
00034     qshared_ptr(const qshared_ptr<Y> &p)
00035         : shared_ptr<T>(static_cast<const shared_ptr<Y> &>(p) ) {}
00036     template <class Y>
00037     explicit qshared_ptr(Y * p)
00038         : shared_ptr<T>(p, _sharedPtrQDeleter) {
00039         ASSERT(isMainThread());
00040     }
00041     template <class Y>
00042     qshared_ptr<T> &operator=(const qshared_ptr<Y> &p) {
00043         shared_ptr<T>::operator=(p);
00044         return *this;
00045     }
00046 };

00050 class _XQConnectorHolder : public QObject
00051 {
00052     Q_OBJECT
00053 public:
00054     _XQConnectorHolder(XQConnector *con);
00055     ~_XQConnectorHolder();
00056     bool isAlive() const;
00057 private slots:
00058         protected slots:
00059 void destroyed ();
00060 protected:
00061     shared_ptr<XQConnector> m_connector;
00062 public:
00063 };
00064 
00065 typedef qshared_ptr<_XQConnectorHolder> xqcon_ptr;

00079 //! Needed for making new forms.

00081 
00082 //! Providing an easy access to make a new form with UIs designed by Qt designer.
00083 template <class FRM, class UI>
00084 struct QForm : public FRM, public UI {
00085     QForm() : FRM(), UI() {this->setupUi(this);}
00086     template <typename A>
00087     explicit QForm(A a) : FRM(a), UI() {this->setupUi(this);}
00088     template <typename A, typename B>
00089     QForm(A a, B b) : FRM(a, b), UI() {this->setupUi(this);}
00090     template <typename A, typename B, typename C>
00091     QForm(A a, B b, C c) : FRM(a, b, c), UI() {this->setupUi(this);}
00092 };
00093 
00094 //! Associate QWidget to XNode.
00095 //! use connectWeak() to make XListener.
00096 //! use xqcon_create<T>() to make instances.
00097 //! \sa xqcon_create()
00098 class XQConnector : public QObject,
00099 public enable_shared_from_this<XQConnector>
00100 {
00101     //! Don't forget this macro for XQConnector objects.
00102     Q_OBJECT
00103     //! needed for XQConnector and cousins
00104     XQCON_OBJECT
00105 protected:
00106     //! Don't use this stuff directly, use xqcon_create() instead
00107     //! \sa xqcon_create()
00108     XQConnector(const shared_ptr<XNode> &node, QWidget *item);
00109 public:
00110     //! Disconnect all signals & slots
00111     virtual ~XQConnector();
00112 
00113     static shared_ptr<XNode> connectedNode(const QWidget *item);
00114 private slots:
00115 protected slots:
00116 protected:
00117     bool isItemAlive() const {return m_pWidget;}
00118     shared_ptr<XListener> m_lsnUIEnabled;
00119     void onUIEnabled(const shared_ptr<XNode> &node);
00120     QWidget *m_pWidget;
00121 };

00140     QAbstractButton *const m_pItem;
00141 };

00483 //! Show status
00484 class QMainWindow;
00485 class QStatusBar;
00486 class KPassivePopup;
00487 class XStatusPrinter : public enable_shared_from_this<XStatusPrinter>
00488 {
00489 protected:
00490     explicit XStatusPrinter(QMainWindow *window = NULL);
00491 public:
00492     static shared_ptr<XStatusPrinter> create(QMainWindow *window = NULL);
00493     ~XStatusPrinter();
00494     void printMessage(const XString &str, bool popup = true);
00495     void printWarning(const XString &str, bool popup = false);
00496     void printError(const XString &str, bool popup = true);
00497     void clear();
00498 private:
00499     struct tstatus {XString str; int ms; bool popup; enum {Normal, Warning, Error} type;};
00500     XTalker<tstatus> m_tlkTalker;
00501     shared_ptr<XListener> m_lsn;
00502     QMainWindow *m_pWindow;
00503     QStatusBar *m_pBar;
00504     KPassivePopup *m_pPopup;
00505     void print(const tstatus &status);
00506 };
